The ring of the gods (i) is the upgraded version of the regular ring of the gods. It can be imbued with 650,000 Nightmare Zone points or 260 Soul Wars tokens, both options requiring a holy wrench. Imbuing the ring does not consume the wrench.

The imbued version incorporates the holy wrench's benefit of increasing prayer points restored from potions when it is equipped, and also provides an extra +4 prayer bonus compared to the regular version. The increased prayer restoration effect of the ring of the gods, Prayer cape and holy wrench do not stack.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 August 2016
(update | poll)

The prayer bonus was changed from +4 to +8 as the ring of suffering (i) previously offered the same prayer bonus along with other benefits.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Although a holy wrench cannot be taken to a Castle Wars game, the ring of the gods can.
  • Unlike all other imbued rings bonuses, the defence bonuses of the ring of gods are unchanged after imbuing.

[[File:Ring of the gods (i) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''ring of the gods (i)''' is the upgraded version of the regular [[ring of the gods]]. It can be imbued with 650,000 [[Nightmare Zone]] points or 260 [[Soul Wars]] tokens, both options requiring a [[holy wrench]]. Imbuing the ring '''does not''' consume the wrench.

The imbued version incorporates the holy wrench's benefit of increasing prayer points restored from potions when it is equipped, and also provides an extra +4 prayer bonus compared to the regular version. The increased prayer restoration effect of the ring of the gods, [[Prayer cape]] and holy wrench '''do not stack'''.
